biotools.summary:
A SIMPLI (Single-cell Identification from MultiPLexed Images) approach for spatially resolved tissue phenotyping at single-cell resolution. SIMPLI is a platform agnostic pipeline for the analysis of highly multiplexed histological imaging data.

This will run SIMPLI on minimal example dataset distributed in this repository. For more details on the example dataset and the associated analysis workflow see the example-workflow page.

bioschemas.name: SIMPLI
